Description: Limestone casing-block from the Great Pyramid.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: 'L'art egyptien au temps des pyramides' (Paris, 1999), p. 184 [33]; Hoelzl (ed.), 'Die Pyramiden Agyptens - Monumente der Ewigkeit' (2004), p.253, Cat. 61; The British Museum, 'A guide to the Egyptian galleries (Sculpture)' (London, 1909), p. 5, nos. 10-12.
Bibliographic references: Metropolitan Museum of Art 1999 / Egyptian Art in the Age of the Pyramids (35)
Exhibition history: 30 Apr-1 Nov 2004. Schallaburg,---- 'Die Pyramiden Agyptens' 2013, 22 Jan - 20 May, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna , 'In the Shadows of the Pyramids: The Austrian excavations at Giza (1912 – 1929)'
Associated places: Associated with: Pyramid of Khufu (used at)
